kickstart.post:
/sbin/chkconfig rabbitmq-server on /usr/lib/rabbitmq/bin/rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management
# start the server and set up user credential /sbin/service rabbitmq-server start admin_pass=$(< /dev/urandom tr -dc _A-Z-a-z-0-9 | head -c26) /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl add_user admin ${admin_pass} /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl set_user_tags admin administrator /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p / admin ".*" ".*" ".*" /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl delete_user guest echo "&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;" > /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq.conf echo "${admin_pass}" > /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq_admin.conf chmod 400 /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq.conf chmod 400 /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq_admin.conf
# adding rabbitmq to 411 so we push the password to the nodes echo "FILES_NOCOMMENT += /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq.conf" >> /var/411/Files.mk /usr/bin/make -C /var/411 411.mk
